page: AE40036: Non Linear Vibration In Aerospace Structures

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21004, AE31002, AE31005 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsPhase space, singular points, limit cycles; analytic methods, perturbation techniques, equivalent linearization; Duffing s equation, jump phenomenon, Van der Pol equation; Stability criteria; Floquet s theory, Hill s and Mathieu s equations, Bifurcation and chaos; application in aerospace continuous structures.
page: AE40036: Non Linear Vibration In Aerospace Structures
